Name: Scavenia Survivors
About the game: Scavenia Survivors - Play as one of the last survivors of a post-apocalyptic medieval world ravaged by monsters. Fight off ferocious mutants and vicious monsters, and try to escape before it gets to hard to do so... In Scavenia Survivor, you're not playing as a hero; instead, you'll feel helplessly trapped in a dark and dangerous world full of dangers waiting to destroy you. Yo u must survive until your last breath. Can you make it? About Scavenia Survivors Supports mouse, keyboard, controller, and touch screen. Can be played offline, doesn't require an active internet connection. Every new run will reward you with a new hero or permanent perk. Different weapons for different play styles available to acquire and level up. Constant Game Updates We are committed to keep adding new content to improve the game, with at least one update per week.
